Event Propagation
Contador elemento pai: {{valorContadorPai}}
*ngIf
*ngSwitchCase
*ngFor
*ngClass
*ngContent
Personal Directive

With a personal directive you can access an element by its reference

Pipes
Form Template
Form Reactive
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-study', templateUrl: './study.component.html', styleUrls: ['./study.component.css'] }) export class StudyComponent { title = 'angular-study'; valorContadorPai:number=0; ngIfShowHide:boolean=false; onMudaValor(evento:any){ this.valorContadorPai=evento.novoValor; } onShowHide(){ this.ngIfShowHide=!this.ngIfShowHide; } }
